channel.title: Vertigo's Development team
channel.description:
It will be fast and simple... I was working on that project about a month and people do like that server and some of them wish even to play.
[quote="CreatorAlex, post:12, topic:413314"]Wow. I've never seen this before. A server with something that everyone doesn't have!
I think you ought to keep going with the custom maps, they look great.[/quote] [quote="pkerzscap3, post:5, topic:412776"]Woah, Looks awesome![/quote] [quote="mrduck, post:9, topic:412776"]looks nice![/quote]
And I am now continuing to Version 2! Version 2 wil be not released in download section but it will be online for people to play!
I am in need of some people that would like to work with me on Vertigo and build up that great server...
You need to reply me by those informations: [b]Server Sided Coders[/b] [code]Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: How well can you code java: MSN (Optional):[/code] [b]Client Sided Coders[/b] [code]Client Coder Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be Working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: Can you add Custom Buttons: Are you good with Interfaces? MSN (Optional):[/code]
[center][size=14pt][b]Spots open:[/b][/size][/center] [center]• Server Coder: 0/2 -
•Client Coders 1/2 - -Xion (Me)[/center]
[center][size=14pt][b]Media[/b][/size][/center] [IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/1504/45716984.png[/img] [IMG]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/5450/96437789.png[/img] [IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/3039/15105562.png[/img] [IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/1372/capturesn.png[/img] [IMG]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/4111/89529188.png[/img] [IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/4458/46065706.png[/img] [IMG]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/1339/45863232.png[/img] [IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4165/37861977.png[/img]
